article:
One night,a little before nine o'clock,Dr Johnson was answering a telephone call. He was asked to go and operate on a very sick boy at once.The boy was in a small hospital in Glens Falls,sixty miles _ from Dr Johnson's city--Albany.The boy had hurt himself in a traffic accident. His life was in danger,but his family was _ poor that they couldn't _ the doctor anything, After hearing this ,Dr Johnson started to head to the hospital at once.He thought that he could get to the hospital before 12 o'clock . A few minutes later,the doctor's car had to stop for a red light at a crossing. Suddenly a man in an old black coat opened the door of the car and got in.
"Drive on,"he said,"I've _ a gun."
"I'm a doctor,said Johnson." "I'm on my way to a hospital to operate on a very sick..."
"Don't _ ,"said the man in the old black coat."Just drive."
A mile out of the town he ordered the doctor to stop and get out. Then the man drove on _ The road.The doctor stood for a moment in the snow.Half an hour later Dr Johnson found a telephone and called a taxi.At the railway station he learnt that that the next train to Glens Falls would not leave _ 12 o'clock.
It was about _ o'clock in the morning when the doctor arrived at the hospital in Glens Falls. "The boy just _ an hour ago !" said the nurse. "I've _ my best. It took me about five hours to come here from my home, because I meet a...." Suddenly he saw the man in the old black coat, _ his head in his hands."Mr Shute," said the nurse to the man, "This is Dr Johnson. He has come all the way from Albany to try to _ your boy."
